verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> unto Moses וְאֶֽל־ <WH413> and to אַהֲרֹ֖ן <WH175> and unto Aaron לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> Every man עַל־ <WH5921> his own דִּגְל֤וֹ <WH1714> by his own standard בְאֹתֹת֙ <WH226> with the ensign לְבֵ֣ית <WH1004> house אֲבֹתָ֔ם <WH1> of their father's יַחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> shall pitch בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel מִנֶּ֕גֶד <WH5048> far off סָבִ֥יב <WH5439> about לְאֹֽהֶל־ <WH168> the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֖ד <WH4150> of the congregation יַחֲנֽוּ׃ <WH2583> shall they pitch

וְהַחֹנִים֙ <WH2583> pitch קֵ֣דְמָה <WH6924> And on the east side מִזְרָ֔חָה <WH4217> toward the rising דֶּ֛גֶל <WH1714> of the sun shall they of the standard מַחֲנֵ֥ה <WH4264> of the camp יְהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> of Judah לְצִבְאֹתָ֑ם <WH6635> throughout their armies וְנָשִׂיא֙ <WH5387> [shall be] captain לִבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> the son יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> of Judah נַחְשׁ֖וֹן <WH5177> and Nahshon בֶּן־ <WH1121> of the children עַמִּינָדָֽב׃ <WH5992> of Amminadab

וּצְבָא֖וֹ <WH6635> And his host וּפְקֻדֵיהֶ֑ם <WH6485> and those that were numbered אַרְבָּעָ֧ה <WH702> four וְשִׁבְעִ֛ים <WH7657> seventy אֶ֖לֶף <WH505> thousand וְשֵׁ֥שׁ <WH8337> and six מֵאֽוֹת׃ <WH3967> hundred

וְהַחֹנִ֥ים <WH2583> And those that do pitch עָלָ֖יו <WH5921> next מַטֵּ֣ה <WH4294> next unto him [shall be] the tribe יִשָּׂשכָ֑ר <WH3485> of Issachar וְנָשִׂיא֙ <WH5387> [shall be] captain לִבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> the son יִשָּׂשכָ֔ר <WH3485> of Issachar נְתַנְאֵ֖ל <WH5417> and Nethaneel בֶּן־ <WH1121> of the children צוּעָֽר׃ <WH6686> of Zuar

וּצְבָא֖וֹ <WH6635> And his host וּפְקֻדָ֑יו <WH6485> and those that were numbered אַרְבָּעָ֧ה <WH702> and four וַחֲמִשִּׁ֛ים <WH2572> thereof [were] fifty אֶ֖לֶף <WH505> thousand וְאַרְבַּ֥ע <WH702> and four מֵאֽוֹת׃ <WH3967> hundred ס

מַטֵּ֖ה <WH4294> [Then] the tribe זְבוּלֻ֑ן <WH2074> of Zebulun וְנָשִׂיא֙ <WH5387> [shall be] captain לִבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> the son זְבוּלֻ֔ן <WH2074> of Zebulun אֱלִיאָ֖ב <WH446> and Eliab בֶּן־ <WH1121> of the children חֵלֹֽן׃ <WH2497> of Helon

וּצְבָא֖וֹ <WH6635> And his host וּפְקֻדָ֑יו <WH6485> and those that were numbered שִׁבְעָ֧ה <WH7651> and seven וַחֲמִשִּׁ֛ים <WH2572> thereof [were] fifty אֶ֖לֶף <WH505> thousand וְאַרְבַּ֥ע <WH702> and four מֵאֽוֹת׃ <WH3967> hundred

כָּֽל־ <WH3605> that הַפְּקֻדִ֞ים <WH6485> All that were numbered לְמַחֲנֵ֣ה <WH4264> in the camp יְהוּדָ֗ה <WH3063> of Judah מְאַ֨ת <WH3967> [were] an hundred אֶ֜לֶף <WH505> thousand וּשְׁמֹנִ֥ים <WH8084> and fourscore אֶ֛לֶף <WH505> thousand וְשֵֽׁשֶׁת־ <WH8337> and six אֲלָפִ֥ים <WH505> thousand וְאַרְבַּע־ <WH702> and four מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> hundred לְצִבְאֹתָ֑ם <WH6635> throughout their armies רִאשֹׁנָ֖ה <WH7223> These shall first יִסָּֽעוּ׃ <WH5265> set forth ס

דֶּ֣גֶל <WH1714> [shall be] the standard מַחֲנֵ֧ה <WH4264> of the camp רְאוּבֵ֛ן <WH7205> of Reuben תֵּימָ֖נָה <WH8486> On the south side לְצִבְאֹתָ֑ם <WH6635> according to their armies וְנָשִׂיא֙ <WH5387> and the captain לִבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> of the children רְאוּבֵ֔ן <WH7205> of Reuben אֱלִיצ֖וּר <WH468> [shall be] Elizur בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son שְׁדֵיאֽוּר׃ <WH7707> of Shedeur

וּצְבָא֖וֹ <WH6635> And his host וּפְקֻדָ֑יו <WH6485> and those that were numbered שִׁשָּׁ֧ה <WH8337> and six וְאַרְבָּעִ֛ים <WH705> thereof [were] forty אֶ֖לֶף <WH505> thousand וַחֲמֵ֥שׁ <WH2568> and five מֵאֽוֹת׃ <WH3967> hundred

וְהַחוֹנִ֥ם <WH2583> And those which pitch עָלָ֖יו <WH5921> next מַטֵּ֣ה <WH4294> by him [shall be] the tribe שִׁמְע֑וֹן <WH8095> of Simeon וְנָשִׂיא֙ <WH5387> and the captain לִבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> of the children שִׁמְע֔וֹן <WH8095> of Simeon שְׁלֻמִיאֵ֖ל <WH8017> [shall be] Shelumiel בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son צוּרִֽי־ שַׁדָּֽי׃ <WH6701> of Zurishaddai

וּצְבָא֖וֹ <WH6635> And his host וּפְקֻדֵיהֶ֑ם <WH6485> and those that were numbered תִּשְׁעָ֧ה <WH8672> and nine וַחֲמִשִּׁ֛ים <WH2572> of them [were] fifty אֶ֖לֶף <WH505> thousand וּשְׁלֹ֥שׁ <WH7969> and three מֵאֽוֹת׃ <WH3967> hundred

וְמַטֵּ֖ה <WH4294> Then the tribe גָּ֑ד <WH1410> of Gad וְנָשִׂיא֙ <WH5387> and the captain לִבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> of the sons גָ֔ד <WH1410> of Gad אֶלְיָסָ֖ף <WH460> [shall be] Eliasaph בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son רְעוּאֵֽל׃ <WH7467> of Reuel

וּצְבָא֖וֹ <WH6635> And his host וּפְקֻדֵיהֶ֑ם <WH6485> and those that were numbered חֲמִשָּׁ֤ה <WH2568> and five וְאַרְבָּעִים֙ <WH705> of them [were] forty אֶ֔לֶף <WH505> thousand וְשֵׁ֥שׁ <WH8337> and six מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> hundred וַחֲמִשִּֽׁים׃ <WH2572> and fifty

כָּֽל־ <WH3605> that הַפְּקֻדִ֞ים <WH6485> All that were numbered לְמַחֲנֵ֣ה <WH4264> in the camp רְאוּבֵ֗ן <WH7205> of Reuben מְאַ֨ת <WH3967> [were] an hundred אֶ֜לֶף <WH505> thousand וְאֶחָ֨ד <WH259> and one וַחֲמִשִּׁ֥ים <WH2572> and fifty אֶ֛לֶף <WH505> thousand וְאַרְבַּע־ <WH702> and four מֵא֥וֹת <WH3967> hundred וַחֲמִשִּׁ֖ים <WH2572> and fifty לְצִבְאֹתָ֑ם <WH6635> throughout their armies וּשְׁנִיִּ֖ם <WH8145> in the second rank יִסָּֽעוּ׃ <WH5265> And they shall set forth ס

וְנָסַ֧ע <WH5265> shall set forward אֹֽהֶל־ <WH168> Then the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֛ד <WH4150> of the congregation מַחֲנֵ֥ה <WH4264> with the camp הַלְוִיִּ֖ם <WH3881> of the Levites בְּת֣וֹךְ <WH8432> in the midst הַֽמַּחֲנֹ֑ת <WH4264> of the camp כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> as they יַחֲנוּ֙ <WH2583> as they encamp כֵּ֣ן <WH3651> so יִסָּ֔עוּ <WH5265> so shall they set forward אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> every man עַל־ <WH5921> in יָד֖וֹ <WH3027> in his place לְדִגְלֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH1714> by their standards ס

דֶּ֣גֶל <WH1714> [shall be] the standard מַחֲנֵ֥ה <WH4264> of the camp אֶפְרַ֛יִם <WH669> of Ephraim לְצִבְאֹתָ֖ם <WH6635> according to their armies יָ֑מָּה <WH3220> On the west side וְנָשִׂיא֙ <WH5387> and the captain לִבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> of the sons אֶפְרַ֔יִם <WH669> of Ephraim אֱלִישָׁמָ֖ע <WH476> [shall be] Elishama בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son עַמִּיהֽוּד׃ <WH5989> of Ammihud

וּצְבָא֖וֹ <WH6635> And his host וּפְקֻדֵיהֶ֑ם <WH6485> and those that were numbered אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <WH705> of them [were] forty אֶ֖לֶף <WH505> thousand וַחֲמֵ֥שׁ <WH2568> and five מֵאֽוֹת׃ <WH3967> hundred

וְעָלָ֖יו <WH5921> Next מַטֵּ֣ה <WH4294> And by him [shall be] the tribe מְנַשֶּׁ֑ה <WH4519> of Manasseh וְנָשִׂיא֙ <WH5387> and the captain לִבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> of the children מְנַשֶּׁ֔ה <WH4519> of Manasseh גַּמְלִיאֵ֖ל <WH1583> [shall be] Gamaliel בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son פְּדָהצֽוּר׃ <WH6301> of Pedahzur

וּצְבָא֖וֹ <WH6635> And his host וּפְקֻדֵיהֶ֑ם <WH6485> and those that were numbered שְׁנַ֧יִם <WH8147> and two וּשְׁלֹשִׁ֛ים <WH7970> of them [were] thirty אֶ֖לֶף <WH505> thousand וּמָאתָֽיִם׃ <WH3967> and two hundred

וּמַטֵּ֖ה <WH4294> Then the tribe בִּנְיָמִ֑ן <WH1144> of Benjamin וְנָשִׂיא֙ <WH5387> and the captain לִבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> of the sons בִנְיָמִ֔ן <WH1144> of Benjamin אֲבִידָ֖ן <WH27> [shall be] Abidan בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son גִּדְעֹנִֽי׃ <WH1441> of Gideoni

וּצְבָא֖וֹ <WH6635> And his host וּפְקֻדֵיהֶ֑ם <WH6485> and those that were numbered חֲמִשָּׁ֧ה <WH2568> and five וּשְׁלֹשִׁ֛ים <WH7970> of them [were] thirty אֶ֖לֶף <WH505> thousand וְאַרְבַּ֥ע <WH702> and four מֵאֽוֹת׃ <WH3967> hundred

כָּֽל־ <WH3605> that הַפְּקֻדִ֞ים <WH6485> All that were numbered לְמַחֲנֵ֣ה <WH4264> of the camp אֶפְרַ֗יִם <WH669> of Ephraim מְאַ֥ת <WH3967> [were] an hundred אֶ֛לֶף <WH505> thousand וּשְׁמֹֽנַת־ <WH8083> and eight אֲלָפִ֥ים <WH505> thousand וּמֵאָ֖ה <WH3967> and an hundred לְצִבְאֹתָ֑ם <WH6635> throughout their armies וּשְׁלִשִׁ֖ים <WH7992> in the third rank יִסָּֽעוּ׃ <WH5265> And they shall go forward ס

דֶּ֣גֶל <WH1714> The standard מַחֲנֵ֥ה <WH4264> of the camp דָ֛ן <WH1835> of Dan צָפֹ֖נָה <WH6828> [shall be] on the north side לְצִבְאֹתָ֑ם <WH6635> by their armies וְנָשִׂיא֙ <WH5387> and the captain לִבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> of the children דָ֔ן <WH1835> of Dan אֲחִיעֶ֖זֶר <WH295> [shall be] Ahiezer בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son עַמִּֽישַׁדָּֽי׃ <WH5996> of Ammishaddai

וּצְבָא֖וֹ <WH6635> And his host וּפְקֻדֵיהֶ֑ם <WH6485> and those that were numbered שְׁנַ֧יִם <WH8147> and two וְשִׁשִּׁ֛ים <WH8346> of them [were] threescore אֶ֖לֶף <WH505> thousand וּשְׁבַ֥ע <WH7651> and seven מֵאֽוֹת׃ <WH3967> hundred

וְהַחֹנִ֥ים <WH2583> And those that encamp עָלָ֖יו <WH5921> next מַטֵּ֣ה <WH4294> by him [shall be] the tribe אָשֵׁ֑ר <WH836> of Asher וְנָשִׂיא֙ <WH5387> and the captain לִבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> of the children אָשֵׁ֔ר <WH836> of Asher פַּגְעִיאֵ֖ל <WH6295> [shall be] Pagiel בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son עָכְרָֽן׃ <WH5918> of Ocran

וּצְבָא֖וֹ <WH6635> And his host וּפְקֻדֵיהֶ֑ם <WH6485> and those that were numbered אֶחָ֧ד <WH259> and one וְאַרְבָּעִ֛ים <WH705> of them [were] forty אֶ֖לֶף <WH505> thousand וַחֲמֵ֥שׁ <WH2568> and five מֵאֽוֹת׃ <WH3967> hundred

וּמַטֵּ֖ה <WH4294> Then the tribe נַפְתָּלִ֑י <WH5321> of Naphtali וְנָשִׂיא֙ <WH5387> and the captain לִבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> of the children נַפְתָּלִ֔י <WH5321> of Naphtali אֲחִירַ֖ע <WH299> [shall be] Ahira בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son עֵינָֽן׃ <WH5881> of Enan

וּצְבָא֖וֹ <WH6635> And his host וּפְקֻדֵיהֶ֑ם <WH6485> and those that were numbered שְׁלֹשָׁ֧ה <WH7969> and three וַחֲמִשִּׁ֛ים <WH2572> of them [were] fifty אֶ֖לֶף <WH505> thousand וְאַרְבַּ֥ע <WH702> and four מֵאֽוֹת׃ <WH3967> hundred

כָּל־ <WH3605> that הַפְּקֻדִים֙ <WH6485> All they that were numbered לְמַ֣חֲנֵה <WH4264> in the camp דָ֔ן <WH1835> of Dan מְאַ֣ת <WH3967> [were] an hundred אֶ֗לֶף <WH505> thousand וְשִׁבְעָ֧ה <WH7651> and seven וַחֲמִשִּׁ֛ים <WH2572> and fifty אֶ֖לֶף <WH505> thousand וְשֵׁ֣שׁ <WH8337> and six מֵא֑וֹת <WH3967> hundred לָאַחֲרֹנָ֥ה <WH314> hindmost יִסְע֖וּ <WH5265> They shall go לְדִגְלֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH1714> with their standards פ

אֵ֛לֶּה <WH428> These פְּקוּדֵ֥י <WH6485> These [are] those which were numbered בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel לְבֵ֣ית <WH1004> by the house אֲבֹתָ֑ם <WH1> of their fathers כָּל־ <WH3605> that פְּקוּדֵ֤י <WH6485> all those that were numbered הַֽמַּחֲנֹת֙ <WH4264> of the camps לְצִבְאֹתָ֔ם <WH6635> throughout their hosts שֵׁשׁ־ <WH8337> [were] six מֵא֥וֹת <WH3967> hundred אֶ֙לֶף֙ <WH505> thousand וּשְׁלֹ֣שֶׁת <WH7969> and three אֲלָפִ֔ים <WH505> thousand וַחֲמֵ֥שׁ <WH2568> and five מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> hundred וַחֲמִשִּֽׁים׃ <WH2572> and fifty

וְהַ֨לְוִיִּ֔ם <WH3881> But the Levites לֹ֣א <WH3808> were not הָתְפָּקְד֔וּ <WH6485> were not numbered בְּת֖וֹךְ <WH8432> among בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> after צִוָּ֥ה <WH6680> commanded יְהוָ֖ה <WH3069> God אֶת־ <WH853> מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <WH4872> Moses

וַֽיַּעֲשׂ֖וּ <WH6213> did בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel כְּ֠כֹל <WH3605> to all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after צִוָּ֨ה <WH6680> commanded יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> according to all that the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> מֹשֶׁ֗ה <WH4872> Moses כֵּֽן־ <WH3651> so חָנ֤וּ <WH2583> so they pitched לְדִגְלֵיהֶם֙ <WH1714> by their standards וְכֵ֣ן <WH3651> and so נָסָ֔עוּ <WH5265> and so they set forward אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> every one לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָ֖יו <WH4940> after their families עַל־ <WH5921> according בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> according to the house אֲבֹתָֽיו׃ <WH1> of their fathers
